description: React component for displaying and managing alerts, including loading alert data from an API, acknowledging, and muting alerts.

methods.name: Alerts()
methods.description: React functional component displaying alerts with actions to acknowledge and mute.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches alerts data from API and updates component state.

methods.name: acknowledge
methods.description: Sends acknowledge action for an alert and reloads data.

methods.name: mute
methods.description: Sends mute action for an alert and reloads data.
